topComments.author: Ajith Sankar
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Que lugar. Fizemos essa rota do vale de Nubra a Pangong. Evitamos o shyok e tomamos esse caminho. Para minha surpresa, quase todo o sapo est√° pronto e com a parte superior preta. Um excelente passeio com vistas incr√≠veis. Para os pilotos aventureiros, existem estradas fora de estrada ou cortes de ahoet entre as estradas. Poucos deles s√£o muito escorregadios e muito √≠ngremes. We took this route from nubra valley to pangong. We avoided shyok and took this route. To my surprise, almost the entire toad is done and with black top. An excellent ride with amazing views. For adventurous riders, there are off roads or ahoet cuts in between the roads. Few of them are very slippery and very steep. Please be careful as the help on this route is very very rare. Temperature drops all of a sudden.one of the best passes. A must during your Ladakh ride.

topComments.author: Dirk Poelman

As estradas tamb√©m s√£o boas agora .. mas abrem apenas no ver√£o por causa das avalanches, fortes nevascas e deslizamentos de terra podem ocorrer a qualquer momento e √†s vezes podem bloquear alguns trechos da estrada, Tamb√©m, Muito provavelmente, a maioria das pessoas sente o mal-estar da altitude por volta de 2.500-2.800 metros.  Sugiro: n√£o v√° se tiver problemas de altitude. Voc√™ n√£o pode obter ajuda m√©dica imediata. Ningu√©m est√° l√° para ajud√°-lo no topo.  (Original) Enjoy fresh air and fresh water just melted from snow .. View is very beautiful  and road are adventure for bikers . Only few vehicle use this road... Roads  is also good now.. but only open in summer because of Avalanches, heavy snowfalls and landslides can occur anytime and can sometimes block some sections of the road, Also, Most probably, Most people feel altitude sickness at around 2,500-2,800 meters.  I suggest:  don't go if you have  altitude problem. You can't get immediate medical help. No one is there to help you at top .
